Topic Summary: Appeal against an assessment raised by Revenue, pursuant to which the Respondent sought the refund of payments under the Temporary Wage Subsidy Scheme (“TWSS”), and whether PRSI is owed
Tax Legislation: Section 28(1) of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (“the 2020 Act”), sections 28(9) – (11) of the 2020 Act, section 28(18) of the 2020 Act, section 28(19) of the 2020 Act.
